meta_keywords: Indian Cables & Electricals Private Limited map & directions
data.meta_description: Indian Cables & Electricals Private Limited - Offering Torrent Cables in Pune, Maharashtra. Read about company. Get contact details and address | ID: 2104342888
data.text:
we shall deliver products and services of committed quality on time to meet customer requirements. We shall create an environment in which each employee contributes towards continual improvement in all aspects of our business processes, complying with the requirements of quality management system.

chief executive officer

date : 25th april, 2002

manufacturers of ht-xlpe,lt-xlpe and pvc cables

first cable company in india to be awarded iso 9001:2000 certification

one of the largest manufacturers of xlpe cables with highest market share in htcsable

instumentation cables screened / unscreened type in pvc / ldpe

in house facilities cater to all routine type, acceptance and special tests

infrastructure includes well equipped r&d centre having modern facilities to continuously upgrade and introduce new products, new compounds, analysis of materials and products as well as simulation studies to establish process parameters

inhouse manufacture of pvc compounds

all cables of different types and sizes get regularly tested at cpri and at erda laboratories

products are bis certified
